channel.title: getting started on Bitcoin Dev Kit
channel.description: Recent content in getting started on Bitcoin Dev Kit

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Introduction This article should serve as a “getting started” guide for developers who are considering integrating BDK in their projects: it tries to introduce the reader to the basic concepts behind the library and some of its modules and components that can be used to build a very simple functioning Bitcoin wallet. All the information written in this article are valid for the current master git branch, and should remain valid for the upcoming v0.
